snapshot-date.description: Date and time when the inventory snapshot was taken

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) for the product

fnsku.description: Fulfillment Network SKU for the product

asin.description: Unique identifier for the product in Amazon's catalog

condition.description: Condition of the product (e.g., New, Used, Refurbished)

available.description: Quantity of the product currently available for sale

pending-removal-quantity.description: Quantity of the product pending removal from inventory

inv-age-0-to-90-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 0 to 90 days

inv-age-91-to-180-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 91 to 180 days

inv-age-181-to-270-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 181 to 270 days

inv-age-271-to-365-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 271 to 365 days

inv-age-365-plus-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged 365+ days

currency.description: Currency in which the monetary values are represented

qty-to-be-charged-ltsf-9-mo.description: Quantity to be charged long-term storage fee for the next 9 months

projected-ltsf-9-mo.description: Projected long-term storage fee for the next 9 months

qty-to-be-charged-ltsf-12-mo.description: Quantity to be charged long-term storage fee for the next 12 months

estimated-ltsf-next-charge.description: Estimated long-term storage fee for the next charge

units-shipped-t7.description: Units of the product shipped in the last 7 days

units-shipped-t30.description: Units of the product shipped in the last 30 days

units-shipped-t60.description: Units of the product shipped in the last 60 days

units-shipped-t90.description: Units of the product shipped in the last 90 days

alert.description: Flag indicating if there is any alert related to the inventory planning data

your-price.description: Your set price for the product

sales-price.description: Current sales price of the product

lowest-price-new-plus-shipping.description: Lowest price including shipping for a new product

lowest-price-used.description: Lowest price for a used product

recommended-action.description: Recommended action to manage the inventory

healthy-inventory-level.description: Recommended healthy level of inventory for the product

recommended-sales-price.description: Recommended sales price for the product

recommended-sale-duration-days.description: Recommended duration for the product to be on sale

recommended-removal-quantity.description: Recommended quantity of product to be removed from inventory

estimated-cost-savings-of-recommended-ac.description: Estimated cost savings by taking recommended actions

sell-through.description: Rate at which the product is selling

item-volume.description: Volume of the item in storage units

volume-unit-measurement.description: Unit of measurement for the volume of the product

storage-type.description: Type of storage used for the product (e.g., Standard, Oversized)

storage-volume.description: Volume occupied by the product in storage

marketplace.description: Marketplace identifier where the product is listed

sales-rank.description: Sales rank of the product in the marketplace

days-of-supply.description: Number of days for which the inventory is expected to last

estimated-excess-quantity.description: Estimated excess quantity of the product in inventory

weeks-of-cover-t30.description: Number of weeks the current inventory will cover at the sales rate over the last 30 days

weeks-of-cover-t90.description: Number of weeks the current inventory will cover at the sales rate over the last 90 days

featuredoffer-price.description: Featured offer price of the product

sales-shipped-last-7-days.description: Quantity of the product shipped in the last 7 days

sales-shipped-last-30-days.description: Quantity of the product shipped in the last 30 days

sales-shipped-last-60-days.description: Quantity of the product shipped in the last 60 days

sales-shipped-last-90-days.description: Quantity of the product shipped in the last 90 days

inv-age-0-to-30-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 0 to 30 days

inv-age-31-to-60-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 31 to 60 days

inv-age-61-to-90-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 61 to 90 days

inv-age-181-to-330-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 181 to 330 days

inv-age-331-to-365-days.description: Quantity of product inventory aged between 331 to 365 days

estimated-storage-cost-next-month.description: Estimated storage cost for the next month

inbound-quantity.description: Quantity of the product currently in transit to Amazon's fulfillment center

inbound-working.description: Quantity of the product in the fulfillment center being processed

inbound-shipped.description: Quantity of the product shipped to the fulfillment center but not yet received

inbound-received.description: Quantity of the product received in the fulfillment center but not yet available for sale

no-sale-last-6-months.description: Indicator if there were no sales in the last 6 months

reserved-quantity.description: Quantity of the product reserved for future sales

unfulfillable-quantity.description: Quantity of the product that is unfulfillable

estimated-ais-181-210-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 181-210

estimated-ais-211-240-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 211-240

estimated-ais-241-270-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 241-270

estimated-ais-271-300-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 271-300

estimated-ais-301-330-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 301-330

estimated-ais-331-365-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 331-365

estimated-ais-365-plus-days.description: Estimated quantity of units to be charged in days 365+

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-181-210-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 181-210 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-211-240-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 211-240 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-241-270-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 241-270 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-271-300-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 271-300 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-301-330-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 301-330 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-331-365-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 331-365 based on inventory health

quantity-to-be-charged-ais-365-plus-days.description: Quantity to be charged in days 365+ based on inventory health

dataEndTime.description: End time of the data snapshot in date format
